subject: Partnership Inquiry - Guest Post/Link Placement on {Website_Name}
body:
Hi {Receiver_Name},

I came across your website {Website_Name} and wanted to ask if you currently accept guest posts or link insertions in the casino/gambling niche.

We work with clients in this industry who are looking for placements on quality websites like yours. If you do accept this niche, could you please share your rates, guidelines, and available options?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best regards,

{Sender_Name}
